author: Carmen Reinicke
title: Jim Chanos warns investors against buying 'virus stocks' like Zoom, Peloton, and Clorox that are dominating the coronavirus lockdown
description: Jim Chanos, founder of Kynikos Associates, warned investors against buying "virus stocks" doing well amid the coronavirus lockdowns in a Thursday interview with CNBC. Chanos named Zoom, Peloton, Teladoc, and Clorox as "virus stocks." "Of course when the virus…
content:
Business Insider
Jim Chanos cautioned investors against getting swept up investing in so-called "virus stocks" that are being boosted amid the coronavirus pandemic. 
Chanos named Zoom, Peloton, Teladoc, and Clorox as stocks that are "doing well right now in… [+1975 chars]
